sentences.en: And the chest strength unbend two arms with the arm department, supports the body.
sentences.cn: 用臂部及胸部力量伸直两臂, 将身体支撑起来.

sentences.en: He is lying on his back, both hands puts either side, double foot unbend.
sentences.cn: 他仰卧着, 双手放两旁, 双脚伸直.

sentences.en: In her dying days the old queen unbent a little.
sentences.cn: 在老女王垂死的日子里，她的态度放松了一些。

sentences.en: Most professors unbend outside the lecture theatre.
sentences.cn: 教授在课下大都很随便.

sentences.en: She finds it hard to unbend, even at parties.
sentences.cn: 她发现即使在派对上都难以松弛.

sentences.en: To unbend the arm other muscles in the back of the arm have to shorten.
sentences.cn: 要伸直手臂,背面的肌肉就得收缩.
